OrgName.entry: SEX THERAPY AND PSYCHOSEXUAL COUNSELLING - JUNE BOORMAN/KATE WILLCOX/RUTH HALLAM-JONES

Desc.entry: All counsellors have received training in Sex Therapy from National RELATE Marriage Guidance. An initial assessment interview is held to see if therapy is suitable for the couple. Treatment sessions are usually held weekly, aimed at helping the couple relearn more satisfying sexual behaviour. Appointments can be arranged daytime and evenings. Costs approximately £50 per session for a couple and £45 for an individual. Please contact for up-to-date details of prices.
